website_summaries.verdict: The JBL E65BTNC headphones deliver bass-forward Bluetooth audio with decent noise cancellation for the price.
pros: Powerful audio performance with deep bass response, bright highs
Decent noise cancellation (when music is off)
Can be used in wired mode passively or with active noise cancellation

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: These are a great set of headphones with good all round sound and for the price of £85!! Would definitely recommend to anyone who likes good bass and great connections to their phone!
customer_reviews.author: Will G.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, too heavy.
customer_reviews.text: This was unfortunately my second JBL headphones. After 3 months of light use and care right side of plastic headband cracked then week after left side got broken.Avoid!
customer_reviews.author: RG Niemczycka

customer_reviews.title: Great value or money highly comparable to bose products or some sennheisers
customer_reviews.text: I can efficiently ignore my family and coworkers with these, thank you for providing me with the peace and quiet my ears have longed for while also letting me listen to katy perry without being judged.
customer_reviews.author: DatBoi

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones.
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves these headphones. No more having to endure other people’s mind numbing conversations on the train. My son is selling his Beats to get a pair of these.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Heslop

customer_reviews.title: Great all round headphones
customer_reviews.text: I use these for the gym and general wear. Fit comfortably. Get a bit hot at the gym but most headphones do anyway. Sound is great. I love them
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: CRACKLING PROBLEMS
customer_reviews.text: CONSTANT CRACKLING PROBLEMS WITH BOTH SIDES OF THE HEADSET WOULD NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: ayuub

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for the money
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic punchy sound. Great noise cancelling function really quietens things down to allow the music through 😊
customer_reviews.author: Gonefishing

customer_reviews.title: The Hinges are Very Fragile
customer_reviews.text: Even just through occasional use, the hinges have cracked with one side breaking completely. You can glue the hinge shut, meaning it won't fold neatly into the bag, but they will still work and the ear pads will swivel. Bear in mind, I use these occasionally and still managed to crack one side and break the other. JBL offer no spare parts to repair, so I would suggest a better brand that will let you repair them.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good for blocking out sound whilst working from home
customer_reviews.text: The noise cancelling was not as great as I thought but it did work to drown out traffic outside. The sound quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Trist

customer_reviews.title: beautiful sound but not for the tube:)
customer_reviews.text: nice headphones, completely cancels the noise when at home, outside, but not for the tube:), underground
customer_reviews.author: Gita

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancelling is actually decent as is the sound quality, however I'd reccomend buying this on sale
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: The noise canceling breaks after a couple of days. ...
customer_reviews.text: The noise canceling breaks after a couple of days ...resulting in cracking noises at the slightest move. It happened to the first pair and i got them replaced but it seems its a common deffect to this model.
customer_reviews.author: Vieriu

product_meta.title: JBL E65BTNC in Black Matte - Over Ear Wireless Bluetooth Headphones - Active Noise Cancelling - Universal Remote with Microphone - Battery Up to 24 Hours
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Black Matte

JBL T65BTNC HEADPHONES IN BLACK MATTE
Tune in to your world. Here comes a new era of listening. Your music, your time. Streamlined, lightweight design offers compact comfort, and long lasting enjoyment. Quality made to last with durable materials, now in three fresh colours. Crystal clear Pure Bass Sound plays up to 24 hours. Life made simple with hands-free headset for calls, quiet concentration or the freshest beats. Advanced 32 mm driver size generates monstrous levels of sound, with every note loud and clear. So the beat goes on. 

Product Details

 * Product Type: Wireless, Over Ear Active Noise Cancelling Headphones
 * Playing Time: 24 hours* with Bluetooth and Active Noise Cancelling activated
 * Driver size: 40 mm
 * Colour: Black Matte
 * Weight: 258 g
 * Charge Time: 2 hours
 * Bluetooth Version: 4

JBL by Harman

For over 70 years, JBL has engineered the most precise, impressive sound found in big venues around the world. Harman's mission and vision is to make life more connected, entertaining, personalized and productive. The company combines passion and purpose to design smart products systems, software and services to connect people wherever they are. 



BOX CONTAINS
1 pair of E65BTNC headphones, 1 Detachable cable,1 Charging cable,Warning card, Warranty card, Safety sheet,QSG
feature_bullets: The era of listening deep, powerful JBL pure bass brings you the highest quality, most precise sound/for a crystal clear level of audio meant to be felt, not just heard
Your sounds, your time - rechargeable, extensive battery life offers up to 24 hours of uninterrupted music listening/long-lasting fun and no messy cords: Wherever you go
Life made simple: Universal one-button volume control and built-in microphone/foldable durable and lightweight design for maximum comfort and long-term use
Discover JBL Sound with a 40 mm driver; multi-functionality for audio, noise reduction, gaming and calls (Android, iPhone, smartphones, laptop, desktop compatible)
Items delivered: 1 x JBL T65BTNC headphones in black matte, one charging cable , warranty Card
